pageContext.claim: “Sleepy Joe can't do this -- that, I can tell you. In fact, it was his problem with Obamacare that caused part of your problem....I hope the seniors are going to remember it, because Biden is the one that put us into the jam because they didn't know what they were doing. They were incompetent.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump bashed Obamacare when he announced that some Medicare drug plans will begin offering a new insulin benefit that would pay a maximum of $35 a month. But here's the rub: The new Trump insulin option stems in part from experimentation authority that Medicare gained under the Affordable Care Act, aka Obamacare.
